projects.title: Infineon
projects.description: Infineon Technologies is a German microchip manufacturer. A multi-billion dollar company with a very outdated visual identity. I decided to change that in by gratest project so far. Let us welcome to the world the newly refined, reimagined and redesigned Infineon.

projects.title: Zephyr
projects.description: Dopamine nowadays is a largely abused neurochemical. It is getting harder and harder to find motivation in a world designed around instant pleasures. Zephyr is hopeful attempt to push the people towards reconnecting with themselves. Becoming mindful of the world inside you and around you. Just breathe.

projects.title: Monkey Dream
projects.description: Self-limiting yourself in design is a neat practice for coming up with unexpected ideas and results. This is how Monkey Dream was born. An artbook designed using Expositions of digital and physical experimentaion with different ways to communicate the idea of a banana. And yes, it was very fun.

projects.description: A cutting-edge project focused on AI development.

projects.title: Cage
projects.description: Totalitarian existence (not life) is best viewed through the prism of absurdity and sarcasm. Bold slogans of the party shaping your individual self into a collective idenity and daily distractions. I wanted to capture that by mixing digital media and physical typography experiments for poster design. So how many fingers, Winston?

projects.title: Concrete Position
projects.description: A cutting-edge project focused on AI development.

projects.title: Prussian Culture Museum
projects.description: Prussian heritage was viciously erased after the WW1 and WW2. Language just barely survived and spoken by very few. As a result of collaboration with Prussian Community of Lithuania on historical matters and Vilnius Academy of Arts on design aspects, we attempted to conceptualize how could Prussian Culture Museum look like.

projects.title: Shameless Snacks
projects.description: Sugar is quite difficult not to crave. Expecially when there are so many candies, deserts, cakes and other sweet miracles around. Shameless Snacks wanted to allow people to indulge in their sweet desires while not compromising on health. As a part of a test task, they asked me to develop email design, social media post and social media animation for their product.

projects.title: Terraform
projects.description: Concrete jungles are being built with incredible speed. They replace natual greenery and damage the planet's entire ecosystem. Attemps to preserve the greenery are usually futile. Terraform is a conceptualized architecture bureau promoting biophilic design - merging the humans' necessity for buildings with respect to the ancient presence of nature.
